name: Leap Club
headline: Curated marketplace for healthy organic groceries
description:
Leapclub.in is bringing farmer’s markets online. With us customers can order fresh, healthy, pesticide & preservative free food from carefully vetted producers and get it delivered within 12 hours of harvesting or baking. This gives families a wide range of assortment to shop from.

We believe at Leap Club we can leverage technology to bring fresh healthy groceries and guide consumers to make choices that are good for them and the planet.

founders.name: Shubham Bansal, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Leap Club, IIT Delhi & EPFL alumni

founders.name: Divish Gupta, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Leap Club, IIT Delhi alumni

generated_description:
**Leap Club: Bringing Organic to Your Doorstep**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, Leap Club is on a mission to revolutionize how India accesses healthy, organic groceries. Based in Delhi, this vibrant startup aims to create a curated marketplace that connects consumers with locally-sourced, pesticide-free food directly from vetted farmers. 

Leap Club started with a simple but powerful idea: let's put farmer's markets online. The premise is straightforward: you're busy, and buying healthy food shouldn't be a hassle. With just a few clicks, you can order everything from Kashmiri dry fruits to wood-pressed oils and have it delivered to your door within 12 hours of harvesting or baking. This not only ensures freshness but also supports sustainable farming practices and gives back to the communities that produce these goods.

The founders, Divish and Raj, are committed to empowering small farmer collectives, effectively transforming rural lives through fair trade and organic agriculture. They believe that by leveraging technology, they can guide consumers to make better choices that are good for both their health and the planet. 

Leap Club presents a range of products, including:
- Kashmiri Dry Fruits
- Desi Dals
- Wood Pressed Oils 
- Slow Chakki Aata
- Spices and Sweeteners

With a dedicated team of 8, they offer free shipping on orders above Rs. 500 and next-day delivery across the Delhi NCR. Their approach combines mindful consumption with the promotion of local organic farming, making it easier than ever for consumers to choose healthy options.

A notable aspect of Leap Club is its commitment to information transparency. They are clear about how their supply chains work, ensuring that a significant portion of the price goes directly to the farmers. This creates a win-win for everyone involved, from consumers to the farmers themselves.

If you’re interested in supporting a sustainable food revolution while stocking your pantry with nutritious, organic food, check them out at [leapclub.in](https://leapclub.in). It’s not just about consuming; it’s about being part of a larger, meaningful change. Welcome to the Swadesi Way!
